        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var glideEncrypterModule = '7d7ee9e3b7030010ebf7082e7e11a979';
	var defaultTemplate = 'af44335953103300cd1eddeeff7b1285';
	var recordScope = current.sys_scope.source;	
	var recordPackage = current.sys_package.source;

	//prevent creating a submodule under global scope without plugin
	if ((current.parent_crypto_module == glideEncrypterModule && recordScope == 'global' && recordPackage == 'global') ||
		(current.parent_crypto_module == glideEncrypterModule && current.name == 'global.glide_encrypter')) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Invalid attempt to insert a cryptographic module under global package"));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
}
	
	if (recordScope != 'global' && current.parent_crypto_module == glideEncrypterModule) {
		current.setValue('short_name', 'glide_encrypter');
		current.setValue('crypto_spec_template', defaultTemplate);
		current.setValue('crypto_module_lifecycle_state', 'published');
	}
	//when non-scoped plugin's crypto module generated on backend
	if (recordScope == 'global' && recordPackage != 'global') {
		var rename = recordPackage.toLowerCase().replace(/\./g, '_');
		current.setValue('short_name', rename + '_glideencrypter');
		current.setValue('crypto_spec_template', defaultTemplate);
		current.setValue('crypto_module_lifecycle_state', 'published');
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script>
